title: Course for Activating Tacit Knowledge in Reading Comprehension Strategy Instruction for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic reading comprehension strategies and instructional methods
context.additional_context: Focuses on cultivating preservice teachers' ability to systematically analyze reading comprehension strategies based on their own experiences when designing actual lessons. Key learning activities include smartphone-based access to resources and task completion.

learning_goals: Learners can create a list of reading comprehension strategies applicable across various subjects with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can explain the process of transforming tacit knowledge into explicit teaching strategies through case studies reflecting their own instructional experiences.
Learners can critically evaluate the application methods of reading comprehension strategies used in their lesson designs based on peer feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
